m_szDocTitle: When It Comes to Fuel Cell Cars, the Future Is Already Here - Los Angeles Magazine
m_szDocSumamry: No Account? Register here. When It Comes to Fuel Cell Cars, the Future Is Already Here The world’s greenest vehicles are at the L.A. Auto Show, as well as the city’s showrooms Neal Broverman Transportation Comments The L.A. Auto Show always features some of the greenest cars on the road. This year is no exception, although there are several new zero emission vehicles being showcased that might surprise green car aficionados.
